journeyStages.name: Awareness & Research
journeyStages.description: Customer discovers Verizon and researches options
painPoints: Can't find Spanish content on website
improvements: Localized pricing display with cultural context

customerQuote.spanish: No pude entender los términos técnicos en el sitio web en inglés. Cuando encontré la página en español, todavía se sentía como una traducción de máquina. Casi me rindo.
customerQuote.english: I couldn't understand the technical terms on the English website. When I found the Spanish page, it still felt like a machine translation. I almost gave up.

journeyStages.name: Consideration & Comparison
journeyStages.description: Customer evaluates plans and compares with competitors
painPoints: Long wait times for Spanish-speaking agents

customerQuote.spanish: Esperé 20 minutos por un agente en español, y cuando por fin conseguí uno, no entendió mi forma boricua de hablar. Bien frustrante.
customerQuote.english: I waited 20 minutes for a Spanish agent, and when I finally got one, they didn't understand my Puerto Rican way of speaking. Very frustrating.

journeyStages.name: Purchase & Activation
journeyStages.description: Customer completes purchase and activates service
painPoints: Complex checkout process in English only
improvements: Clear payment terms in native language

customerQuote.spanish: El contrato estaba todo en términos legales en inglés. Me tocó pedirle a mi hija que me ayudara a entender qué estaba firmando. No fue una buena experiencia.
customerQuote.english: The contract was all in English legal terms. I had to ask my daughter to help me understand what I was signing. Not a good experience.

journeyStages.name: Onboarding & Setup
journeyStages.description: Customer sets up devices and learns to use services

customerQuote.spanish: El correo de bienvenida estaba en español, pero la guía de configuración estaba en inglés. Tuve que llamar al soporte tres veces para que mi teléfono funcionara.
customerQuote.english: The welcome email was in Spanish, but the setup guide was in English. I had to call support three times to get my phone working.

journeyStages.name: Ongoing Usage & Support
journeyStages.description: Customer uses services and contacts support as needed
painPoints: Long hold times for Spanish support

customerQuote.spanish: Cada vez que llamo, tengo que presionar 2 para español, y luego esperar un chorro de tiempo. La aplicación está toda en inglés. Es como si no les importaran los clientes hispanos.
customerQuote.english: Every time I call, I have to press 2 for Spanish, then wait forever. The app is all in English. It's like they don't care about Spanish customers.

journeyStages.name: Retention & Loyalty
journeyStages.description: Customer renews, upgrades, or considers leaving

customerQuote.spanish: Después de 5 años como cliente, recibí un aviso de renovación en inglés. AT&T me mandó una oferta personal en español. Estoy considerando cambiarme.
customerQuote.english: After 5 years as a customer, I got a renewal notice in English. AT&T sent me a personal offer in Spanish. I'm considering switching.

researchInsights.description: Customers experience increased satisfaction when support is delivered in their native language
Consumers would switch to a competitor offering native language support
First Call Resolution improvement with multilingual support - #1 operational metric
Customer loss rate due to language barriers can be significantly reduced
